title: Trixie Belden and the Mystery on Cobbett's Island
description: The 13th book in a series of 39. Trixie Belden is the main character in a series of 'girl detective' mysteries. The series starts with 'Trixie Belden and the Secret of the Mansion' where Honey, a rich and sickly girl moves in next door to Crabapple Farm, the home of Trixie and her brothers. Throughout the series, Trixie, Honey and all their friends solve heaps of mysteries that baffle authorities and have cops scratching their heads in confusement.
author: Kathryn Kenny
